product_name: Nestle Everyday Dairy Whitener, 400g Pouch: Amazon.in: Grocery & Gourmet Foods

reviews.review_body: 0:090:00This video is not intended for all audiences. What date were you born? Flash Player is required to watch this video.Install Flash PlayerÂ Wonderful substitute for fresh milk which doesn't noticeably change the temperature of your beverage. I love that it's called a whitener in some countries, but it's mostly powdered milk.The product was as shown and the packaging was nice.Also, it is easy to use. Just add the powder to warm water and you are good to go.No lumps formed and tastes also good. Overall, a very nice product.
Best milk powder. Instantly mix with hot water, tea, coffee. Powder taste awesome.

reviews.review_title: This is the best Milk powder available in the market
reviews.review_body: This is the best Milk powder available in the market. No other brand can beat the quality of Nestle. Very good product for routine and emergency use. Nestle products are always best in quality. Have been using this for more than a decade now.

reviews.review_title: mixes well in hot n cold water
reviews.review_body: One of the best dairy whiteners out there. The best part is that it mixes well both in hot and cold water. The taste is not great but a decent enough alternative to milk.
I used amulya..so not good to used..i think is 50% sugar in used..that why not like that..
As usual good as it should be . It makes great color and taste of tea which increases the tea flavour . Good one to get on amazon.  Recently the price  has been increased to Rs 200 .

reviews.review_title: Received Opened pouch ! Can't use it.
reviews.review_body: I've received opened pouch! when i opened the parcel, some milk powders were all spread all over the box! Scared to use it as it was opened already, so just thrown it.
This is a nice handy product. However this doesn't give you fresh milk flavor. I only use it when I'm out of fresh milk. Or I want thikness in kulfi :D
